page.title: 08 The Parish Council
page.content: We belong to the North Dorset District Council and the Dorset County Council. We are called the Lower Winterborne Parish Council. There are three villages altogether, Winterborne Kingston, Winterborne Anderson and Winterborne Zelston. The councillors are: Mr. Langdown, Miss Sheppard, Mrs. Isaac, Mr. Harris, Mrs. Percy Mrs. Viner and Mr. Batchelor from Kingston: Mr. House from Anderson and Mrs. Kerley and Mr. Lewis from Zelston. Mrs. Percy is the Chairman. The clerk is Mrs. Rodgers. They look after the recreation ground, the children's playground, the cemetery, the churchyard and the alllotments. There is a meeting every month and anybody can go. There is an election every four years for members of the Parish Council.
